data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Free State.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Free State, South Africa
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Free State who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Free State, South Africa to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Free State, South Africa.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Jew, English-speaking people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Jew, English-speaking people know you.
Lord, let it be said of the 2,164,752 lost in Free State that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Free State that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Free State, South Africa honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Free State
location.people_groups_list: Vasekela Bushman, Maligo, South Asian, general, Gujarati, Arab, Lebanese, Dutch
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vasekela Bushman, Maligo (3,700), South Asian, general (2,100), Gujarati (32,000), Arab, Lebanese (5,600), Dutch (30,000)
